story.title: DocNowCommunity Chat (RAW)
story.description: These are tweets that were sent as part of the Documenting the Now Community chat on July 16th, 2016. This tweet collection is the raw chronlogical feed of tweets. For a more curated view that groups questions/answers & conversation threads see https://storify.com/docnow/docnowcommunity-chat
